verses.plain: Then the LORD said unto Moses, Now shalt thou see what I will do to Pharaoh: for with a strong hand shall he let them go, and with a strong hand shall he drive them out of his land.

tokens.t: Then the
said unto Moses, Now shalt thou see what I will do to Pharaoh: for with a strong hand shall he let them go, and with a strong hand shall he drive them out of his land.

verses.plain: And God spake unto Moses, and said unto him, I am the LORD:

tokens.t: And God spake unto Moses, and said unto him, I
the

verses.plain: And I appeared unto Abraham, unto Isaac, and unto Jacob, by the name of God Almighty, but by my name JEHOVAH was I not known to them.

tokens.t: And I appeared unto Abraham, unto Isaac, and unto Jacob, by
God Almighty, but by my name
was I not known to them.

verses.plain: And I have also established my covenant with them, to give them the land of Canaan, the land of their pilgrimage, wherein they were strangers.

tokens.t: And I have also established my covenant with them, to give them the land of Canaan, the land of their pilgrimage, wherein they were strangers.

verses.plain: And I have also heard the groaning of the children of Israel, whom the Egyptians keep in bondage; and I have remembered my covenant.

tokens.t: And I have also heard the groaning of the children of Israel, whom the Egyptians keep in bondage; and I have remembered my covenant.

verses.plain: Wherefore say unto the children of Israel, I am the LORD, and I will bring you out from under the burdens of the Egyptians, and I will rid you out of their bondage, and I will redeem you with a stretched out arm, and with great judgments:

tokens.t: Wherefore say unto the children of Israel, I
the
, and I will bring you out from under the burdens of the Egyptians, and I will rid you out of their bondage, and I will redeem you with a stretched out arm, and with great judgments:

verses.plain: And I will take you to me for a people, and I will be to you a God: and ye shall know that I am the LORD your God, which bringeth you out from under the burdens of the Egyptians.

tokens.t: And I will take you to me for a people, and I will be to you a God: and ye shall know that I
the
your God, which bringeth you out from under the burdens of the Egyptians.

verses.plain: And I will bring you in unto the land, concerning the which I did swear to give it to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob; and I will give it you for an heritage: I am the LORD.

tokens.t: And I will bring you in unto the land, concerning the which I did swear to give it to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob; and I will give it you for an heritage: I
the

verses.plain: ¶ And Moses spake so unto the children of Israel: but they hearkened not unto Moses for anguish of spirit, and for cruel bondage.

tokens.t: ¶ And Moses spake so unto the children of Israel: but they hearkened not unto Moses for anguish of spirit, and for cruel bondage.

verses.plain: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

tokens.t: And the
spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.plain: Go in, speak unto Pharaoh king of Egypt, that he let the children of Israel go out of his land.

tokens.t: Go in, speak unto Pharaoh king of Egypt, that he let the children of Israel go out of his land.

verses.plain: And Moses spake before the LORD, saying, Behold, the children of Israel have not hearkened unto me; how then shall Pharaoh hear me, who am of uncircumcised lips?

tokens.t: And Moses spake before the
, saying, Behold, the children of Israel have not hearkened unto me; how then shall Pharaoh hear me, who
of uncircumcised lips?

verses.plain: And the LORD spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, and gave them a charge unto the children of Israel, and unto Pharaoh king of Egypt, to bring the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt.

tokens.t: And the
spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, and gave them a charge unto the children of Israel, and unto Pharaoh king of Egypt, to bring the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt.

verses.plain: ¶ These be the heads of their fathers’ houses: The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel; Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi: these be the families of Reuben.

tokens.t: ¶ These
the heads of their fathers’ houses: The sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel; Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi: these
the families of Reuben.

verses.plain: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman: these are the families of Simeon.

tokens.t: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman: these
the families of Simeon.

verses.plain: ¶ And these are the names of the sons of Levi according to their generations; Gershon, and Kohath, and Merari: and the years of the life of Levi were an hundred thirty and seven years.

tokens.t: ¶ And these
the names of the sons of Levi according to their generations; Gershon, and Kohath, and Merari: and the years of the life of Levi
an hundred thirty and seven years.

verses.plain: The sons of Gershon; Libni, and Shimi, according to their families.

tokens.t: The sons of Gershon; Libni, and Shimi, according to their families.

verses.plain: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel: and the years of the life of Kohath were an hundred thirty and three years.

tokens.t: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel: and the years of the life of Kohath
an hundred thirty and three years.

verses.plain: And the sons of Merari; Mahali and Mushi: these are the families of Levi according to their generations.

tokens.t: And the sons of Merari; Mahali and Mushi: these
the families of Levi according to their generations.

verses.plain: And Amram took him Jochebed his father’s sister to wife; and she bare him Aaron and Moses: and the years of the life of Amram were an hundred and thirty and seven years.

tokens.t: And Amram took him Jochebed his father’s sister to wife; and she bare him Aaron and Moses: and the years of the life of Amram
an hundred and thirty and seven years.

verses.plain: ¶ And the sons of Izhar; Korah, and Nepheg, and Zichri.

tokens.t: ¶ And the sons of Izhar; Korah, and Nepheg, and Zichri.

verses.plain: And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.

tokens.t: And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.

verses.plain: And Aaron took him Elisheba, daughter of Amminadab, sister of Naashon, to wife; and she bare him Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

tokens.t: And Aaron took him Elisheba, daughter of Amminadab, sister of Naashon, to wife; and she bare him Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

verses.plain: And the sons of Korah; Assir, and Elkanah, and Abiasaph: these are the families of the Korhites.

tokens.t: And the sons of Korah; Assir, and Elkanah, and Abiasaph: these
the families of the Korhites.

verses.plain: And Eleazar Aaron’s son took him one of the daughters of Putiel to wife; and she bare him Phinehas: these are the heads of the fathers of the Levites according to their families.

tokens.t: And Eleazar Aaron’s son took him
of the daughters of Putiel to wife; and she bare him Phinehas: these
the heads of the fathers of the Levites according to their families.

verses.plain: These are that Aaron and Moses, to whom the LORD said, Bring out the children of Israel from the land of Egypt according to their armies.

tokens.t: These
that Aaron and Moses, to whom the
said, Bring out the children of Israel from the land of Egypt according to their armies.

verses.plain: These are they which spake to Pharaoh king of Egypt, to bring out the children of Israel from Egypt: these are that Moses and Aaron.

tokens.t: These
they which spake to Pharaoh king of Egypt, to bring out the children of Israel from Egypt: these
that Moses and Aaron.

spake unto Moses in the land of Egypt,
